column4: maybe that error has nothing to do with your executable (some say that error is caused by the bluez-alsa package) just out of curiosity, what app are you trying to run?
is there a config for bluez-alsa?

i assume you have already read this http://sdrsharp.com/index.php/downloads#comment-35  it has been said that the error message you posted comes and goes if you install/uninstall that package. i'm not into configuring bluetoth if you want to do that. good luck
